features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete Firebase authentication with email/password, Google OAuth, email verification, password reset, and 2FA support

features.name: Credit Management System
features.description: Comprehensive credit system with 10 free credits for new users, 2 credits per paid model prompt, real-time tracking via Firestore with localStorage fallback

features.name: AI Model Comparison
features.description: Multi-model AI comparison interface supporting 13+ models (5 paid, 8+ free) with OpenRouter integration, response comparison, rating system, and best response selection

features.name: User Interface Components
features.description: Modern glassmorphism UI with dark/light mode toggle, responsive design, modal system, toast notifications, and settings management

features.name: API Endpoints
features.description: RESTful API endpoints for chat functionality, 2FA operations, and user management with proper authentication and validation

features.name: Security Features
features.description: Two-factor authentication with TOTP, backup codes, secure session management, and input validation

features.name: Email Verification Flow
features.description: Custom email verification system with beautiful success pages, animated UI elements, and automatic redirects

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Credit purchase system with multiple pricing tiers, Stripe integration ready, and beautiful purchase interface

features.name: Data Persistence
features.description: Firestore integration for user data, credits, and settings with localStorage fallback for offline functionality

features.name: Configuration Management
features.description: Environment configuration, Next.js setup with Turbopack, TypeScript configuration, and security headers
